text: Irena Ondrová (19 June 1949 - 5 June 2021) was a Czech politician. She was a member of the Civic Democratic Party. Ondrová was born in Chomutov, Czechoslovakia. She was a member of the Senate from 1996 until 2002. She was also Mayor of Zlín from 2006 until 2010. Ondrová died on 5 June 2021, aged 71.Zemřela někdejší senátorka Irena Ondrová ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Czech politicians Category:Czech mayors
title: Irena Ondrová
